review.author: Frontend (Agent Teams)
review.findings: 3 perf fixes: (1) handleResize refactored — focused pane resizes synchronously, background panes deferred 200ms via setTimeout. deferredResizeTimer cancels stale defers. All callers (scheduleTerminalResize, toggleExpandPane, swapToMainPane, tabs.togglePanel) verified compatible. (2) Scrollback 5000→2000, only affects new Terminal instances. (3) Two document keydown listeners merged into one with early-return routing. Cross-file consistency verified. Confidence HIGH.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
